pgx.baseUrl.description: Base URL of a running PGX server this interpreter should connect to

pgx.trustStore.description: Path to the truststore to use when connecting to PGX

pgx.keyStore.description: Path to the keystore to use when connecting to PGX

pgx.secretStore.description: Path to the keystore to use when credentials are needed for loading to PGX

pgx.timeout.description: Timeout in seconds after which a command should be canceled

pgx.maxConcurrency.description: Number of executions which can run simultaneously

pgx.prettyprint.description: pretty print text output as html (experimental) - true or false

pgx.visualizePgqlResults.description: If true, will return special JSON for PGQL queries which can be used for visualization (needs frontend support)

pgx.maxResults.description: Maximum number of results to be returned
